mapper.select: SELECT s.name subname, p.name pname, s.content, s.time, s.location, d.name dname, s.sseq FROM subject s, professor p, department d WHERE sseq=#{sseq} AND s.dseq = d.dseq AND p.id = s.id
SELECT * FROM search_major WHERE subname LIKE '%'||#{subname} ||'%' OR pname LIKE '%'||#{pname} ||'%'
SELECT * FROM search_liberalArts WHERE subname LIKE '%'||#{subname} ||'%' OR pname LIKE '%'||#{pname} ||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject(sseq, name, id, time, majoryn, content, dseq, location) VALUES(subject_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subname}, #{pid}, #{time}, #{majoryn}, #{content}, #{dseq}, #{location})
mapper.select: SELECT s.name subname, s.sseq, p.id, d.dseq, r.rseq, d.rdseq , p.name pname, s.time, d.name dname FROM subject s, professor p, department d ,register r , register_detail d WHERE r.id = #{sid} AND d.dseq = s.dseq AND p.id = s.id AND s.sseq = d.sseq AND r.rseq = d.rseq
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM search_major WHERE subname LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%' OR pname LIKE '%'||#{key} ||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM search_liberalArts WHERE subname LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%' OR pname LIKE '%'||#{key} ||'%'

SELECT subname, pname, time, dname, sseq FROM( SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY subname) rn,subname, pname, time, dname, sseq FROM search_liberalArts WHERE subname LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%' OR pname LIKE '%'||#{key} ||'%') WHERE rn <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.rowsPerPage} AND rn > (#{criteria.pageNum}-1) * #{criteria.rowsPerPage}

SELECT subname, pname, time, dname, sseq FROM( SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY subname) rn,subname, pname, time, dname, sseq FROM search_major WHERE subname LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%' OR pname LIKE '%'||#{key} ||'%') WHERE rn <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.rowsPerPage} AND rn > (#{criteria.pageNum}-1) * #{criteria.rowsPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM search_major WHERE dseq = #{dseq} AND (subname LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%' OR pname LIKE '%'||#{key} ||'%')
